ccre.cluck_old

Class CluckEncoder.AvailableListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.cluck_old.CluckEncoder.AvailableListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CluckChannelListener
    Enclosing class:
    CluckEncoder

    public abstract static class CluckEncoder.AvailableListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements CluckChannelListener
    An AvailableListener is notified whenever a new object is provided on the network that it did not previously know about.
    See Also:
    #searchAndSubscribePublished(ccre.cluck.CluckEncoder.AvailableListener)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected CArrayList<java.lang.String> totality
      The list of everything that has been recorded as existing so far.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CluckEncoder.AvailableListener() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearRecord()
      Clear all the known objects in existence.
      void receive(java.lang.String channel, byte[] data)
      Implementation detail - this is how the AvailableListener detects various new objects.
      protected abstract void updateAdded(java.lang.String channel)
      Called whenever a new object is detected on the network.
      protected abstract void updatedReceived()
      Called whenever a new package of provided objects is received.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • totality

        protected CArrayList<java.lang.String> totality
        The list of everything that has been recorded as existing so far. This is automatically added to, and updateAdded and updatedReceived are automatically called when that happens.
        See Also:
        clearRecord()

    • Constructor Detail

      • CluckEncoder.AvailableListener

        public CluckEncoder.AvailableListener()

    • Method Detail

      • clearRecord

        public void clearRecord()
        Clear all the known objects in existence. Can be used when you want to relist everything on the network, in conjunction with searchPublished()
        See Also:
        CluckEncoder.searchPublished()

      • updatedReceived

        protected abstract void updatedReceived()
        Called whenever a new package of provided objects is received. May be called when there was no change to listing. updateAdded is called for each new listing, and may be a better choice to implement.

      • updateAdded

        protected abstract void updateAdded(java.lang.String channel)
        Called whenever a new object is detected on the network. This will not be recalled for the same channel unless clearRecord() is called.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel of the objects that has just been discovered.

      • receive

        public void receive(java.lang.String channel,
           byte[] data)
        Implementation detail - this is how the AvailableListener detects various new objects.
        Specified by:
        receive in interface CluckChannelListener
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel of the received message.
        data - the received data.
